name: Eclipse - Star Voyage
description:
Eclipse - Star Voyage is a VR experience that takes you through an action-packed space adventure as the pilot of a space freighter - when things go wrong. No controllers are required for this game - it uses gaze input only. Works with phones that can run Google Cardboard stuff, and a Cardboard headmount thingy (any of those VR headsets that are just phone cases).

Also available on Game Jolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/eclipse-star-voyage/278723

Made originally as part of PIGSquad's Summer Slow Jams - VR/AR jam, where the theme was "Change of Perspective".

#SSJvrar #pigsquad
